field.label: Description
field.help: Optional description for the neighbor.

field.label: Peer-IP
field.help: Specify the IP address of the BGP neighbor.

field.label: Remote AS
field.help: AS (Autonomous System) number of the neighbor, required for establishing a BGP session.

field.label: BGP MD5 Password
field.help: Password used for MD5 authentication of BGP connections to enhance security.

field.label: Weight
field.help: Default weight for routes from this neighbor; higher weight increases path preference within the same AS.

field.label: Local Initiater IP
field.help: Specify the local IP address used to establish connections with the neighbor. Only relevant for MD5 authentication.

field.label: Update-Source Interface
field.help: Interface (IPv4) where BGP sessions are sourced from, typically required when using loopback addresses.

field.label: IPv6 link-local interface
field.help: Interface for IPv6 link-local neighbors, used primarily for link-local IPv6 addressing.

field.label: Next-Hop-Self
field.help: Sets the local router as the next hop for routes advertised to the neighbor, commonly used in Route Reflector setups.

field.label: Next-Hop-Self All
field.help: Extends Next-Hop-Self by applying the setting to all addresses, including multiple address families.

field.label: Multi-Hop
field.help: Enables connections to eBGP neighbors across multiple hops; often required for peering over loopback addresses.

field.label: Multi-Protocol
field.help: Enables multiprotocol BGP for support of additional address families like IPv6.

field.label: Route Reflector Client
field.help: Marks the neighbor as a client for a route reflector; used to reduce the number of full BGP mesh connections.

field.label: Soft reconfiguration inbound
field.help: Allows policy changes without resetting the session by storing inbound updates.

field.label: BFD
field.help: Enable Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) for rapid link failure detection with the neighbor.

field.label: Keepalive
field.help: Sets the interval (default 60 seconds) between keepalive messages to check the neighbors availability.

field.label: Hold Down Time
field.help: Time (default 180 seconds) before declaring a neighbor down if no keepalive messages are received.

field.label: Connect Timer
field.help: Interval to attempt reconnecting with a neighbor after a disconnect.

field.label: Send Defaultroute
field.help: Sends a default route to the neighbor, useful in small AS environments where a full routing table is not necessary.

field.label: Enable AS-Override
field.help: Allows replacement of the neighbors AS with the local AS, common in eBGP confederations.

field.label: Disable Connected Check
field.help: Allows eBGP connections over loopback addresses by bypassing checks for direct connections.

field.label: Attribute Unchanged
field.help: Keeps specified attributes (like MED, AS-Path, etc.) unchanged in updates to the neighbor.

field.label: Prefix-List In
field.help: Prefix list to filter inbound prefixes from this neighbor.

field.label: Prefix-List Out
field.help: Prefix list to filter outbound prefixes sent to this neighbor.

field.label: Route-Map In
field.help: Route-map to apply to routes received from this neighbor.

field.label: Route-Map Out
field.help: Route-map to apply to routes advertised to this neighbor.

field.label: Peer Group
field.help: Groups neighbors with similar configurations to simplify management.
